Gene.description: Gene table with HGNC, Entrez, and Ensembl identifiers, linked to master Entity.

Entity.description: Master table for all biological entities (gene, variant, protein, etc).

EntityName.description: Aliases and alternate names for entities.

EntityRelation.description: Relationships between two entities (e.g., Gene â†” Protein).

Variant.description: Genetic variants (SNPs, Indels) with position and type information.

Protein.description: Protein information extracted from UniProt, linked to genes and Pfam.

Pathway.description: Biological pathways with KEGG and Reactome identifiers.
